title: The ONE Group owns six restaurant brands
statement: The ONE Group operates STK Steakhouse, Kona Grill, RA Sushi, Benihana, Samurai and Salt Water Social restaurant brands.

citations.quote: The ONE Group, Inc. corporate-owned locations of the following The ONE Group restaurant brands: STK Steakhouse, Kona Grill, RA Sushi, Benihana, Samurai and Salt Water Social
